sqlReaderQuery.value:
select * from saleslt.address where modifieddate >=
'@{activity('get highwatermark date').output.firstRow.Prop_0}'
and modifieddate< '@{activity('get last modified sql date').output.value[0].lastmodifieddate}'

activities.name: Copy last modified date into High watermark file

properties.description: Create a pipeline name 'Ingestion_Product_Addres_To_JSON' which will copy all the product records as JSON only if total number of records >10. After that check total record count in address table if they are greater than 100 then copy the adress table data as CSV in ADLS.
